=== Release Meeting Bugs ===

All of these bugs are milestoned to (appropriate milestone?) or are believed fixed.

=== Weekly summary ===

=== RC Milestoned bugs ===

==== Outstanding ====

* Bug:529366: Regression: usb-creator-gtk doesn't work as of 0.2.16
** ev: mostly fixed, but contemplating unmounting all partitions before setting the boot flag
* Bug:530027: nested progress bars don't work outside debconffilter
** looks like it may not be necessary for lucid; awaiting another test run by cjwatson
* Bug:534743: dmraid causes udev event feedback loop in Lucid
** needs somebody who knows dmraid to prepare a patch
* Bug:553290: Loops on mount failure when Plymouth not running
* Bug:553745: plymouthd crashed with SIGSEGV in ply_event_loop_process_pending_events()
* Bug:559761: mountall needs to flush plymouth message queue before emitting upstart events
** cluster of recently-filed/targeted Plymouth-related bugs, with recent progress

==== Good progress ====

==== Not critical for release ====

* Bug:522225: permissions incorrect on libmysqlclient16_7.0.9-1_amd64.deb
** lucid->lucid only, so not critical
* Bug:527972: [Lucid Alpha 3] usb-creator.exe does not accept ISO selection on Windows XP system
** ev: not looked at in great detail yet, although we do have an older working version that we could drop in if necessary; offered for download independently of ISO building
* Bug:538505: Extremely slow reponsiveness / high CPU usage
** cause unknown at this point, but Riddell says we can release with this if necessary

==== Fixed or fix-committed ====

* Bug:515023: ATA pass-through commands preventing external HDD to be mounted
* Bug:549738: [Lucid Beta2] Booting with new ubiquity live session audio doesn't work
* Bug:556555: oem-config loops indefinitely in Kubuntu OEM installations
* Bug:563291: libc6 2.11.1-0ubuntu5 strcmp-ssse3 may return incorrect result

==== Deferred ====

* Bug:345126: Installer on UNR image creates too small swap partition

=== Release-targeted bugs ===
